citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
On Thursday, January 14, 2021, between 2:30 pm and 3:00 pm, a responsible adult was not available to accompany
APHIS Officials during the inspection process.
Inspector contacted the licensee by phone and they were not available to accompany on an inspection. This is the first
attempted inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries. 
On Thursday, January 14, 2021, between 2:30 pm and 3:00 pm, a responsible adult was not available to accompany 
APHIS Officials during the inspection process. 
Inspector contacted the licensee by phone and they were not available  to accompany on an inspection. This is the first 
attempted inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
